verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1980>Go<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them, and <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> and give them <S%H3196>wine<s%> to <S%H8248>drink.<s%>

Then I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2970>Jaazaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2262>Habaziniah,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites;<s%>

And I <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2605>Hanan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3012>Igdaliah,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was by the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H4605>above<s%> the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%> the <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H5592>door:<s%>

And I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites<s%> <S%H1375>pots<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H3563>cups,<s%> and I <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H8354>Drink<s%> you <S%H3196>wine.<s%>

But they <S%H559>said,<s%> We will <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3196>wine:<s%> for <S%H3122>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us, <S%H559>saying,<s%> You shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> neither you, nor your <S%H1121>sons<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall you <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> have any: but <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H168>tents;<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you be <S%H1481>strangers.<s%>

Thus have we <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that he has <S%H6680>charged<s%> us, to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H3117>days,<s%> we, our <S%H802>wives,<s%> our <S%H1121>sons,<s%> nor our <S%H1323>daughters;<s%>

<S%H1115>Nor<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> for us to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in: <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> we <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> nor <S%H7704>field,<s%> nor <S%H2233>seed:<s%>

But we have <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H168>tents,<s%> and have <S%H8085>obeyed,<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3122>Jonadab<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us.

But it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> that we <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H935>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> and for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians:<s%> so we <S%H3427>dwell<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> Will you not <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to my <S%H1697>words?<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab,<s%> that he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> not to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> are <S%H6965>performed;<s%> for to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3808>none,<s%> but <S%H8085>obey<s%> their <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H4687>commandment:<s%> notwithstanding I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to you, <S%H7925>rising<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H1696>speaking;<s%> but you <S%H8085>listened<s%> not to me.

I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> also to you <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H7925>rising<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7725>Return<s%> you <S%H4994>now<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H3190>amend<s%> your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> not <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, and you shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to you and to your <S%H1>fathers:<s%> but you have not <S%H5186>inclined<s%> your <S%H241>ear,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to me.

<S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> have <S%H6965>performed<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of their <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them; but <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> has not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to me:

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> on <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I have <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them: <S%H3282>because<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to them, but they have not <S%H8085>heard;<s%> and I have <S%H7121>called<s%> to them, but they have not <S%H6030>answered.<s%>

And <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4687>precepts,<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that he has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you:

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3122>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> shall not <S%H3772>want<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me for <S%H3605>ever.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
